from a friend 👇
最近見好多朋友講緊由WhatsApp轉會Signal
當年，小弟響香港某廣告公司工作
曾經負責Line嘅網絡宣傳工作

今日想同大家分享一下
當年我接觸到嘅競爭對手WhatsApp
佢地嘅網絡言論策略，
睇睇佢地多年來
每一次有競爭對手出現都會採用嘅戰略

香港自2008年，
曾令WhatsApp產生危機感而有動作嘅
包括Line，WeChat，以及而家嘅Signal

而每次，
WhatsApp所使用嘅策略都係同一套
包括淡化、抹黑、製造混亂

WhatsApp作為香港人慣性使用嘅通訊軟件
佢地無需要響網絡上贏出任何辯論
佢地嘅目的只有一個
就係「製造資訊疲勞」

WhatsApp非常清楚香港人
「怕麻煩」、「三分鐘熱度」特性
只要令大量資訊持續轟炸
（包括網絡上嘅罵戰，大量資訊湧現）
大部份網民都會響新鮮感下降
以及唔想再睇呢d情緒下
選擇繼續用返「慣性使用」嘅WhatsApp

而事實亦證明，當年Line敗仗
係因為正、反、持平三方大混戰
大量網民對於資訊混亂無法理出頭緒或結論
最終選擇「唔轉會」，「用返WhatsApp算啦」

而至於WeChat，
當年雖然有Big4廣告同演唱會聲勢浩大
甚至響海底隧道出口放出大型廣告牌，
聲勢一時無兩
但WhatsApp以遠低於廣告牌價錢
響討論區製造混亂
配合幾個討論區網民對大陸嘅反感
要維持WhatsApp於霸權實在易如反掌

接下來，本人預計，
WhatsApp已經開始第一階段「淡化」手段
本港網絡上已經開始出現「Signal亦有問題」
以及「WhatsApp做法跟其他產品差不多
呢一類嘅講法

稍後時間，高登連登等討論區，
將會出現大量有關Signal的不利新聞，
假新聞以及罵戰出現
呢一切響2月8日WhatsApp新Policy生效前
將會到達頂峰，令部份人跌落去
「算啦，Click同意WhatsApp嘅Policy」諗法

假若各位真心唔希望霸權繼續
唔希望被PR公司左右，放棄你嘅私隱安全
請認清WhatsApp公司手段
並時刻保持初心，堅持到底
各位加油！

replies.msg:
https://www.thestandnews.com/society/%E8%AA%A3%E8%94%91-signal-%E7%9A%84%E5%81%87%E6%96%B0%E8%81%9E-%E5%8D%8A%E5%B9%B4%E5%BE%8C%E4%BB%8D%E7%84%B6%E6%9C%89%E4%BA%BA%E7%BF%BB%E7%82%92%E5%81%87%E6%B6%88%E6%81%AF/



《標題黨誤導之嫌》
《HKFP》在 2020 年 7 月 5 日刊出了一篇獨家報道，撮要三點：

Telegram 告訴《HKFP》，暫停向香港法院提交香港用戶的資料。

本來按 Telegram 的私隱協議，如有法院命令確認該人與恐怖活動有關，他們可以會把用戶的 IP 地址及電話號碼交給當局。

近來越來越多人使用 Signal。

然後當《Unwire》轉載該新聞，大字標題寫道〈Telegram 暫拒香港政府披露用戶數據ㅤSignal 條款：會就政府要求提供資料〉，卻有明顯的誤導之嫌。
￼
有誤導之嫌的報道（《Unwire》報道截圖）
《Unwire》文章的意思，一下子變成是：

Telegram 暫拒向港府披露資料

但 Signal 會向政府提交資料？？？

兩家公司原本的用戶協議，都聲稱會向當地法院提供資料，《HKFP》只確認了 Telegram 會暫拒香港法院的要求，卻沒有同時向 Signal 查詢過最新針對香港情況的取態。
《HKFP》原文提到 Signal 時，本來只是輕輕一句提到很多人用 Signal，但當《Unwire》轉載時，其標題卻一下子把意思扭曲成 Telegram 暫拒向香港政府提交資料，但 Signal 會就政府要求提供資料。
細心的讀者，應該看到中間的問題了。
標題裡轉述 Telegram 的取態，是他們就著香港最新情況向《HKFP》發出的聲明。而同一標題裡轉述 Signal 的做法，卻只是該公司用戶協議裡一般的陳述，當中根本就沒有嘗試了解 Signal 就香港情況會有甚麼最新取態。
雖然《Unwire》的內文後來又說：「不過，Signal 條款亦有列明『會就政府執法機關要求披露用戶資料』，更未有指明會披露甚麼資料，但該企業會公開其處理政府要求的記錄，而對上一次被要求提交指定用戶資料時，只交出了用戶註冊日期以及最後上線時間。」
而《Unwire》寫出「只交出了用戶註冊日期以及最後上線時間」這句話，正是引述了美國維珍尼亞州東區聯邦地區法院發出傳票一事，但《Unwire》沒有把事實交代清楚，因為 Signal 不是純粹「只交出了用戶註冊日期以及最後上線時間」，而是他們根本沒有保留用戶其他任何資料。
而 Signal 在 Twitter 上有轉載《HKFP》的新聞，並稱：「We’d announce that we’re stopping too, but we never started turning over user data to HK police. Also, we don’t have user data to turn over.」（我們也會宣佈停止，但我們一直沒有開始向香港警方交出用戶數據。而且，我們也沒有用戶數據可交。）

之後我寫了一篇文章，提到 Signal 的 zero knowledge 的操作方式，但見仍有不少人因《Unwire》的文章而質疑 Signal 是否安全。
這就是標題黨誤導的威力。

from a friend 👇
最近見好多朋友講緊由WhatsApp轉會Signal
當年，小弟響香港某廣告公司工作
曾經負責Line嘅網絡宣傳工作

今日想同大家分享一下
當年我接觸到嘅競爭對手WhatsApp
佢地嘅網絡言論策略，
睇睇佢地多年來
每一次有競爭對手出現都會採用嘅戰略

香港自2008年，
曾令WhatsApp產生危機感而有動作嘅
包括Line，WeChat，以及而家嘅Signal

而每次，
WhatsApp所使用嘅策略都係同一套
包括淡化、抹黑、製造混亂

WhatsApp作為香港人慣性使用嘅通訊軟件
佢地無需要響網絡上贏出任何辯論
佢地嘅目的只有一個
就係「製造資訊疲勞」

WhatsApp非常清楚香港人
「怕麻煩」、「三分鐘熱度」特性
只要令大量資訊持續轟炸
（包括網絡上嘅罵戰，大量資訊湧現）
大部份網民都會響新鮮感下降
以及唔想再睇呢d情緒下
選擇繼續用返「慣性使用」嘅WhatsApp

而事實亦證明，當年Line敗仗
係因為正、反、持平三方大混戰
大量網民對於資訊混亂無法理出頭緒或結論
最終選擇「唔轉會」，「用返WhatsApp算啦」

而至於WeChat，
當年雖然有Big4廣告同演唱會聲勢浩大
甚至響海底隧道出口放出大型廣告牌，
聲勢一時無兩
但WhatsApp以遠低於廣告牌價錢
響討論區製造混亂
配合幾個討論區網民對大陸嘅反感
要維持WhatsApp於霸權實在易如反掌

接下來，本人預計，
WhatsApp已經開始第一階段「淡化」手段
本港網絡上已經開始出現「Signal亦有問題」
以及「WhatsApp做法跟其他產品差不多
呢一類嘅講法

稍後時間，高登連登等討論區，
將會出現大量有關Signal的不利新聞，
假新聞以及罵戰出現
呢一切響2月8日WhatsApp新Policy生效前
將會到達頂峰，令部份人跌落去
「算啦，Click同意WhatsApp嘅Policy」諗法

假若各位真心唔希望霸權繼續
唔希望被PR公司左右，放棄你嘅私隱安全
請認清WhatsApp公司手段
並時刻保持初心，堅持到底
各位加油！

replies.msg:
Myth 1. “Telegram’s code is not open-source”. In reality, all Telegram client apps have been open source since 2013 [3]. Our encryption and API are fully documented and have been reviewed by security experts thousands of times. Moreover, Telegram is the only messaging app in the world that has verifiable builds both for iOS and Android [4]. As for WhatsApp, they intentionally obfuscate their code, making it impossible to verify their encryption and privacy.

Myth 2. “Telegram is Russian”. In fact, Telegram has no servers or offices in Russia and was blocked there from 2018 to 2020 [5]. Telegram is still blocked in some authoritarian countries such as Iran, while WhatsApp and other “supposedly secure” apps have never had any issue in these places.

Myth 3. “Telegram is not encrypted”. Every chat on Telegram has been encrypted since launch. We have Secret Chats that are end-to-end and Cloud Chats that also offer real-time secure and distributed cloud storage [6]. WhatsApp, on the other hand, had zero encryption for a few years, and then adopted an encryption protocol funded by the US Government [7]. Even if we assume that the WhatsApp encryption is solid, it’s invalidated via multiple backdoors and reliance on backups [8].

Some of us are mislead by the marketing tactics of other companies. They say telegram is not end-to-end encrypted by default. Let's make the myth and hype abt e2e clear to all.

1. No apps which has backup system can ever be e2e encrypted. So the e2e encryption of whatsapp is a myth since they use icloud and gdrive for backup which are not e2e encryption.

2. Yes, Signal is e2e encrypted. But what their marketing team won’t tell you is they don’t have a backup feature. Now what does this mean to you? If you are using signal for all your important daily work, and if you lost your phone or if you thought to change your phone. There is literally no way, that you can retrieve your old chats.

3. So what is the bestest way, not all of your msgs are secret right?. So for those messages which are private and secret telegram can have e2e encryption and the whole data will never be backed up which you can do using secret chats in telegram. And for those important chats which require backup u can do normal chat which are yes, not e2e protected in telegram but there is a difference between whatsapp and telegram here. Telegram don’t store those chats data in gdrive or icloud which are easily hackable instead they use their cloud platform which till date has not been hacked and Pavel durov also has promised that he won’t sell our data to any govt or third party apps like whatsapp/facebook.
有乜好拗? 邊樣多人用就用邊樣 , TG 推左兩年都推唔到一定有原因既 , 大眾 USERS 唔接受 , 你幾多FUNCTIONS 都係無用

If you are using signal for all your important daily work, and if you lost your phone or if you thought to change your phone. There is literally no way, that you can retrieve your old chats.

3. So what is the bestest way, not all of your msgs are secret right?. So for those messages which are private and secret telegram can have e2e encryption and the whole data will never be backed up which you can do using secret chats in telegram. And for those important chats which require backup u can do normal chat which are yes, not e2e protected in telegram but there is a difference between whatsapp and telegram here. Telegram don’t store those chats data in gdrive or icloud which are easily hackable instead they use their cloud platform which till date has not been hacked and Pavel durov also has promised that he won’t sell our data to any govt or third party apps like whatsapp/facebook.

Myth 1. “Telegram’s code is not open-source”. In reality, all Telegram client apps have been open source since 2013 [3]. Our encryption and API are fully documented and have been reviewed by security experts thousands of times. Moreover, Telegram is the only messaging app in the world that has verifiable builds both for iOS and Android [4]. As for WhatsApp, they intentionally obfuscate their code, making it impossible to verify their encryption and privacy.

Myth 2. “Telegram is Russian”. In fact, Telegram has no servers or offices in Russia and was blocked there from 2018 to 2020 [5]. Telegram is still blocked in some authoritarian countries such as Iran, while WhatsApp and other “supposedly secure” apps have never had any issue in these places.

Myth 3. “Telegram is not encrypted”. Every chat on Telegram has been encrypted since launch. We have Secret Chats that are end-to-end and Cloud Chats that also offer real-time secure and distributed cloud storage [6]. WhatsApp, on the other hand, had zero encryption for a few years, and then adopted an encryption protocol funded by the US Government [7]. Even if we assume that the WhatsApp encryption is solid, it’s invalidated via multiple backdoors and reliance on backups [8].

quote.msg:
Myth 1. “Telegram’s code is not open-source”. In reality, all Telegram client apps have been open source since 2013 [3]. Our encryption and API are fully documented and have been reviewed by security experts thousands of times. Moreover, Telegram is the only messaging app in the world that has verifiable builds both for iOS and Android [4]. As for WhatsApp, they intentionally obfuscate their code, making it impossible to verify their encryption and privacy.

Myth 2. “Telegram is Russian”. In fact, Telegram has no servers or offices in Russia and was blocked there from 2018 to 2020 [5]. Telegram is still blocked in some authoritarian countries such as Iran, while WhatsApp and other “supposedly secure” apps have never had any issue in these places.

Myth 3. “Telegram is not encrypted”. Every chat on Telegram has been encrypted since launch. We have Secret Chats that are end-to-end and Cloud Chats that also offer real-time secure and distributed cloud storage [6]. WhatsApp, on the other hand, had zero encryption for a few years, and then adopted an encryption protocol funded by the US Government [7]. Even if we assume that the WhatsApp encryption is solid, it’s invalidated via multiple backdoors and reliance on backups [8].

Some of us are mislead by the marketing tactics of other companies. They say telegram is not end-to-end encrypted by default. Let's make the myth and hype abt e2e clear to all.

1. No apps which has backup system can ever be e2e encrypted. So the e2e encryption of whatsapp is a myth since they use icloud and gdrive for backup which are not e2e encryption.

2. Yes, Signal is e2e encrypted. But what their marketing team won’t tell you is they don’t have a backup feature. Now what does this mean to you? If you are using signal for all your important daily work, and if you lost your phone or if you thought to change your phone. There is literally no way, that you can retrieve your old chats.

3. So what is the bestest way, not all of your msgs are secret right?. So for those messages which are private and secret telegram can have e2e encryption and the whole data will never be backed up which you can do using secret chats in telegram. And for those important chats which require backup u can do normal chat which are yes, not e2e protected in telegram but there is a difference between whatsapp and telegram here. Telegram don’t store those chats data in gdrive or icloud which are easily hackable instead they use their cloud platform which till date has not been hacked and Pavel durov also has promised that he won’t sell our data to any govt or third party apps like whatsapp/facebook.

科技盲唔好咁大聲, 一味講先進好用

Myth 1. “Telegram’s code is not open-source”. In reality, all Telegram client apps have been open source since 2013 [3]. Our encryption and API are fully documented and have been reviewed by security experts thousands of times. Moreover, Telegram is the only messaging app in the world that has verifiable builds both for iOS and Android [4]. As for WhatsApp, they intentionally obfuscate their code, making it impossible to verify their encryption and privacy.

Myth 2. “Telegram is Russian”. In fact, Telegram has no servers or offices in Russia and was blocked there from 2018 to 2020 [5]. Telegram is still blocked in some authoritarian countries such as Iran, while WhatsApp and other “supposedly secure” apps have never had any issue in these places.

Myth 3. “Telegram is not encrypted”. Every chat on Telegram has been encrypted since launch. We have Secret Chats that are end-to-end and Cloud Chats that also offer real-time secure and distributed cloud storage [6]. WhatsApp, on the other hand, had zero encryption for a few years, and then adopted an encryption protocol funded by the US Government [7]. Even if we assume that the WhatsApp encryption is solid, it’s invalidated via multiple backdoors and reliance on backups [8].

Some of us are mislead by the marketing tactics of other companies. They say telegram is not end-to-end encrypted by default. Let's make the myth and hype abt e2e clear to all.

1. No apps which has backup system can ever be e2e encrypted. So the e2e encryption of whatsapp is a myth since they use icloud and gdrive for backup which are not e2e encryption.

2. Yes, Signal is e2e encrypted. But what their marketing team won’t tell you is they don’t have a backup feature. Now what does this mean to you? If you are using signal for all your important daily work, and if you lost your phone or if you thought to change your phone. There is literally no way, that you can retrieve your old chats.

3. So what is the bestest way, not all of your msgs are secret right?. So for those messages which are private and secret telegram can have e2e encryption and the whole data will never be backed up which you can do using secret chats in telegram. And for those important chats which require backup u can do normal chat which are yes, not e2e protected in telegram but there is a difference between whatsapp and telegram here. Telegram don’t store those chats data in gdrive or icloud which are easily hackable instead they use their cloud platform which till date has not been hacked and Pavel durov also has promised that he won’t sell our data to any govt or third party apps like whatsapp/facebook.

2. Yes, Signal is e2e encrypted. But what their marketing team won’t tell you is they don’t have a backup feature. Now what does this mean to you? If you are using signal for all your important daily work, and if you lost your phone or if you thought to change your phone. There is literally no way, that you can retrieve your old chats.

quote.msg:
from a friend 👇
最近見好多朋友講緊由WhatsApp轉會Signal
當年，小弟響香港某廣告公司工作
曾經負責Line嘅網絡宣傳工作

今日想同大家分享一下
當年我接觸到嘅競爭對手WhatsApp
佢地嘅網絡言論策略，
睇睇佢地多年來
每一次有競爭對手出現都會採用嘅戰略

香港自2008年，
曾令WhatsApp產生危機感而有動作嘅
包括Line，WeChat，以及而家嘅Signal

而每次，
WhatsApp所使用嘅策略都係同一套
包括淡化、抹黑、製造混亂

WhatsApp作為香港人慣性使用嘅通訊軟件
佢地無需要響網絡上贏出任何辯論
佢地嘅目的只有一個
就係「製造資訊疲勞」

WhatsApp非常清楚香港人
「怕麻煩」、「三分鐘熱度」特性
只要令大量資訊持續轟炸
（包括網絡上嘅罵戰，大量資訊湧現）
大部份網民都會響新鮮感下降
以及唔想再睇呢d情緒下
選擇繼續用返「慣性使用」嘅WhatsApp

而事實亦證明，當年Line敗仗
係因為正、反、持平三方大混戰
大量網民對於資訊混亂無法理出頭緒或結論
最終選擇「唔轉會」，「用返WhatsApp算啦」

而至於WeChat，
當年雖然有Big4廣告同演唱會聲勢浩大
甚至響海底隧道出口放出大型廣告牌，
聲勢一時無兩
但WhatsApp以遠低於廣告牌價錢
響討論區製造混亂
配合幾個討論區網民對大陸嘅反感
要維持WhatsApp於霸權實在易如反掌

接下來，本人預計，
WhatsApp已經開始第一階段「淡化」手段
本港網絡上已經開始出現「Signal亦有問題」
以及「WhatsApp做法跟其他產品差不多
呢一類嘅講法

稍後時間，高登連登等討論區，
將會出現大量有關Signal的不利新聞，
假新聞以及罵戰出現
呢一切響2月8日WhatsApp新Policy生效前
將會到達頂峰，令部份人跌落去
「算啦，Click同意WhatsApp嘅Policy」諗法

假若各位真心唔希望霸權繼續
唔希望被PR公司左右，放棄你嘅私隱安全
請認清WhatsApp公司手段
並時刻保持初心，堅持到底
各位加油！

from a friend 👇
最近見好多朋友講緊由WhatsApp轉會Signal
當年，小弟響香港某廣告公司工作
曾經負責Line嘅網絡宣傳工作

今日想同大家分享一下
當年我接觸到嘅競爭對手WhatsApp
佢地嘅網絡言論策略，
睇睇佢地多年來
每一次有競爭對手出現都會採用嘅戰略

香港自2008年，
曾令WhatsApp產生危機感而有動作嘅
包括Line，WeChat，以及而家嘅Signal

而每次，
WhatsApp所使用嘅策略都係同一套
包括淡化、抹黑、製造混亂

WhatsApp作為香港人慣性使用嘅通訊軟件
佢地無需要響網絡上贏出任何辯論
佢地嘅目的只有一個
就係「製造資訊疲勞」

WhatsApp非常清楚香港人
「怕麻煩」、「三分鐘熱度」特性
只要令大量資訊持續轟炸
（包括網絡上嘅罵戰，大量資訊湧現）
大部份網民都會響新鮮感下降
以及唔想再睇呢d情緒下
選擇繼續用返「慣性使用」嘅WhatsApp

而事實亦證明，當年Line敗仗
係因為正、反、持平三方大混戰
大量網民對於資訊混亂無法理出頭緒或結論
最終選擇「唔轉會」，「用返WhatsApp算啦」

而至於WeChat，
當年雖然有Big4廣告同演唱會聲勢浩大
甚至響海底隧道出口放出大型廣告牌，
聲勢一時無兩
但WhatsApp以遠低於廣告牌價錢
響討論區製造混亂
配合幾個討論區網民對大陸嘅反感
要維持WhatsApp於霸權實在易如反掌

接下來，本人預計，
WhatsApp已經開始第一階段「淡化」手段
本港網絡上已經開始出現「Signal亦有問題」
以及「WhatsApp做法跟其他產品差不多
呢一類嘅講法

稍後時間，高登連登等討論區，
將會出現大量有關Signal的不利新聞，
假新聞以及罵戰出現
呢一切響2月8日WhatsApp新Policy生效前
將會到達頂峰，令部份人跌落去
「算啦，Click同意WhatsApp嘅Policy」諗法

假若各位真心唔希望霸權繼續
唔希望被PR公司左右，放棄你嘅私隱安全
請認清WhatsApp公司手段
並時刻保持初心，堅持到底
各位加油！

雖然Telegram以安全聞名，但事實上大部份通話都沒有進行端對端加密。

1. 只有「私密聊天」是端對端加密。根據原始設定，Telegram對話沒有進行端對端加密，你需要選擇私密聊天，才會啟動端對端加密。然而我們發現很多人不知道此分別，他們以為所有Telegram通訊都「自動地」安全。

2. Telegram的端對端加密協定違反了行內最佳做法。正如這個Stack Overflow的討論指出，「密碼學的第一守則，是不要建立自己的密碼」，但這正是Telegram所做的事，更引起其他問題。）

3. 群組對話沒有端對端加密。超過1人參與的對話沒有「私密聊天」選項。

4. 與機械人的對話也沒有端對端加密。沒有跡象顯示，任何與機械人的對話和互動有經過端對端加密。

quote.msg:
雖然Telegram以安全聞名，但事實上大部份通話都沒有進行端對端加密。

1. 只有「私密聊天」是端對端加密。根據原始設定，Telegram對話沒有進行端對端加密，你需要選擇私密聊天，才會啟動端對端加密。然而我們發現很多人不知道此分別，他們以為所有Telegram通訊都「自動地」安全。

2. Telegram的端對端加密協定違反了行內最佳做法。正如這個Stack Overflow的討論指出，「密碼學的第一守則，是不要建立自己的密碼」，但這正是Telegram所做的事，更引起其他問題。）

3. 群組對話沒有端對端加密。超過1人參與的對話沒有「私密聊天」選項。

4. 與機械人的對話也沒有端對端加密。沒有跡象顯示，任何與機械人的對話和互動有經過端對端加密。

科技盲唔好咁大聲, 一味講先進好用

Myth 1. “Telegram’s code is not open-source”. In reality, all Telegram client apps have been open source since 2013 [3]. Our encryption and API are fully documented and have been reviewed by security experts thousands of times. Moreover, Telegram is the only messaging app in the world that has verifiable builds both for iOS and Android [4]. As for WhatsApp, they intentionally obfuscate their code, making it impossible to verify their encryption and privacy.

Myth 2. “Telegram is Russian”. In fact, Telegram has no servers or offices in Russia and was blocked there from 2018 to 2020 [5]. Telegram is still blocked in some authoritarian countries such as Iran, while WhatsApp and other “supposedly secure” apps have never had any issue in these places.

Myth 3. “Telegram is not encrypted”. Every chat on Telegram has been encrypted since launch. We have Secret Chats that are end-to-end and Cloud Chats that also offer real-time secure and distributed cloud storage [6]. WhatsApp, on the other hand, had zero encryption for a few years, and then adopted an encryption protocol funded by the US Government [7]. Even if we assume that the WhatsApp encryption is solid, it’s invalidated via multiple backdoors and reliance on backups [8].

Some of us are mislead by the marketing tactics of other companies. They say telegram is not end-to-end encrypted by default. Let's make the myth and hype abt e2e clear to all.

1. No apps which has backup system can ever be e2e encrypted. So the e2e encryption of whatsapp is a myth since they use icloud and gdrive for backup which are not e2e encryption.

2. Yes, Signal is e2e encrypted. But what their marketing team won’t tell you is they don’t have a backup feature. Now what does this mean to you? If you are using signal for all your important daily work, and if you lost your phone or if you thought to change your phone. There is literally no way, that you can retrieve your old chats.

3. So what is the bestest way, not all of your msgs are secret right?. So for those messages which are private and secret telegram can have e2e encryption and the whole data will never be backed up which you can do using secret chats in telegram. And for those important chats which require backup u can do normal chat which are yes, not e2e protected in telegram but there is a difference between whatsapp and telegram here. Telegram don’t store those chats data in gdrive or icloud which are easily hackable instead they use their cloud platform which till date has not been hacked and Pavel durov also has promised that he won’t sell our data to any govt or third party apps like whatsapp/facebook.

就係「製造資訊疲勞」

WhatsApp非常清楚香港人
「怕麻煩」、「三分鐘熱度」特性
只要令大量資訊持續轟炸
（包括網絡上嘅罵戰，大量資訊湧現）
大部份網民都會響新鮮感下降
以及唔想再睇呢d情緒下
選擇繼續用返「慣性使用」嘅WhatsApp

而事實亦證明，當年Line敗仗
係因為正、反、持平三方大混戰
大量網民對於資訊混亂無法理出頭緒或結論
最終選擇「唔轉會」，「用返WhatsApp算啦」

而至於WeChat，
當年雖然有Big4廣告同演唱會聲勢浩大
甚至響海底隧道出口放出大型廣告牌，
聲勢一時無兩
但WhatsApp以遠低於廣告牌價錢
響討論區製造混亂
配合幾個討論區網民對大陸嘅反感
要維持WhatsApp於霸權實在易如反掌

接下來，本人預計，
WhatsApp已經開始第一階段「淡化」手段
本港網絡上已經開始出現「Signal亦有問題」
以及「WhatsApp做法跟其他產品差不多
呢一類嘅講法

稍後時間，高登連登等討論區，
將會出現大量有關Signal的不利新聞，
假新聞以及罵戰出現
呢一切響2月8日WhatsApp新Policy生效前
將會到達頂峰，令部份人跌落去
「算啦，Click同意WhatsApp嘅Policy」諗法

假若各位真心唔希望霸權繼續
唔希望被PR公司左右，放棄你嘅私隱安全
請認清WhatsApp公司手段
並時刻保持初心，堅持到底
各位加油！

噉請問有冇經過密碼學專家公開驗證過冇問題呢？加密協議一直都建議要用公開驗證嗰個，但佢就偏偏自己整個出嚟，重要唔係預設開啓，group chat冇e2ee

而且佢得客戶端係open source，人哋signal係連server side都open source埋

tg係有tracker喺入面，android就有4個，重多過WhatsApp

而且tg有你嘅ip同電話冧把，signal得你註冊日期同最後上線時間，佢交得依兩樣，交完都冇用

安全界都私隱一直都話tg個安全係唔得，建議轉用signal，我真係第一次聽到有人拎tg同signal鬥安全

tg係勝在多功能同可以隱藏電話冧把，可以用嚟同一啲唔熟，唔希望對方知道自己真實身份嘅人用

我都中意tg，特別係佢啲功能，但signal依家係用嚟取代WhatsApp，你要畀大眾識用同接受先得，tg就做唔到依樣，而且定位都唔同

但tg勝在多功能

現在不支援更改號碼。 請按照以下步驟在新安裝的Signal上設定新的電話號碼。

同一部手機上的新電話號碼

1. 離開所有的群組。
你可能想通知你的群組成員你將離開該群組，並需要他們將你的新號碼新增到該群組中。

2. 註銷你的Signal 電話號碼。
這將防止你錯過訊息，直到你的聯絡人使用新手機及新的電話號碼為止。

3. 用你的新號碼反安裝並重新安裝Signal 。 你將以空的訊息歷史記錄啟動Signal。

4. 請您的聯絡人將新號碼加入到您離開的群組中。

tg係勝在多功能同可以隱藏電話冧把，可以用嚟同一啲唔熟，唔希望對方知道自己真實身份嘅人用
